name: FieldSounds
0:
”Alexa open Field Sounds”
”Alexa ask Field Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: field sounds
des:
Immerse yourself in the peaceful embrace of nature with Field Sounds. Designed to bring the calming essence of the countryside into your home. Escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life and find solace in the soothing sounds of lush fields, gently swaying in the breeze.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Field Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
